thread.section_title: The Pierre, A Taj Hotel, New York - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Princess Night out
thread.title_full: Princess Night out - Review of The Pierre, A Taj Hotel, New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Jackiee-Pedro A
title: Princess Night out
text: I surprised my 14 year old daughter with a concert at the garden to see Ariana Grande this past February and to put the icing on the cake, I booked a one night stay at THE PIERRE HOTEL. My daughter was like speechless and shocked. When she arrived she felt like a celebrity. She asked for a red carpet but she got a great welcome from the elevator staff. She fell in love with the room and the rotunda in the lobby area. Aneesha the front desk manager made my daughter's experience a wonderful one.
